participant_1.background:

I value my relationship with my partner and make sure they know I am there for them.
I'm going to make my grandson a chocolate cake and brew a batch of beer.
i work at the hospital as a nurse.

i enjoy taking walks.

content.text: Pretty good! I got to dress up and explore my nerdy side at Comic Con recently, that was a lot of fun.
Nice! I've never been to Comic Con, but I love watching the videos people post online.
It's a lot of fun! It's really exciting to see all of the different costumes and characters people come up with.
Yeah, I bet! I love seeing people's creativity.
What was your favorite costume you saw at Comic Con?
I think it was probably the guy who was dressed as a giant gummy bear. It was so creative and funny!
That sounds amazing! I would love to see that.
It was really cool! I hope you get to go to Comic Con one day.
Me too! It looks like a lot of fun.
It is! You should definitely go if you get the chance.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! I hope you have a great day!
